description.value:
Recipe Price 50 sp
Ingredients 4 basic, 2 special.
Preparation DC 18 Cooking Lore, DC 20 Survival
Requirements Basic Kitchen plus Magical or Alchemical Crafting OR Magic Kitchen
Favorite Meal The bonus to Acrobatics checks counts to all Acrobatics checks.

Enchiladas are made with a wrapped corn tortilla rolled around a filling and covered in a savory sauce, filled with a variety of ingredients. These vary from cheese, beans, potatoes along with a combination of meats and vegetables. It comes in a variety of sauces, catering to an individual's taste preferences.

Steamshank Enchiladas (frequently referred by its local name Enchiladas de Vapor) make use of steamed, seasoned proteins and vegetables wrapped in foil, before they are rolled into the enchiladas where they are then cooked as normal. Due to Steamshank's proximity to the waters, it frequently uses seafood in its enchiladas. Its a local favorite that has spread to all parts on the Impian Mainland, typically favored by people who need a pick me up on their ability to balance or maneuver in high industry places.

Upon eating the Enchiladas, you gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Qf1ylAbdVi1rkc8M]{Maneuver in Flight} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze}, or increase an existing item bonus by that amount. In addition, during this time you find yourself more nimble. Traveling through corridors slightly smaller than your size allows (such as a 5-foot hallway if you are a Large creature) does not count as difficult terrain, and allies are able to move past you in these corridors.

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.equipment.i1DDHmsERWMYFMz3]{Effect: Enchiladas de Vapor}

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.equipment.QPkGDZUaFrSHrYUl]{Effect: Enchiladas de Vapor (Favorite)}
